pr_title: PR #2 for User Context Implementation - Rights Helper Interface

timeline.message:
Refactored Rights Helper Interface - (Task #548)

- Renamed old interface to SystemUserHasPermission to clearly identify
that this method is about the user that is signed up in the system.
- Adjusted all code to be compatible with this latest change
